translation.en: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.
translation.yo: “Ní báyìí a ní àwọn ẹku olóṣù mẹ́rin tí kò ní dayabẹ́tìsì tẹ́lẹ̀tẹ́lẹ̀ tó ti ní ayabẹ́tìsì̀,” o ṣe àfikún.

translation.en: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.
translation.yo: Dókítà Ehud, akọ́ṣẹmọṣẹ́ ìmọ̀ ogun ní ilé ẹ̀kọ́ gíga Dalhousie ní Halifax, Nova Scotia àti alága ìpín ti ìṣègùn àti ìmọ̀ síẹ̀nsì ti Ẹgbé Ìtọ ṣúggà ti Ará Ìlú Canada sọ pé ìwádìí náà ṣì jẹ́ tuntun.

translation.en: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.
translation.yo: Bí àwọn àkọ́ṣẹ́mọṣẹ́, ó ṣiyèméjì bóyá àrùn ìtọ ṣúgá lè ní ìwòsàn, tí ó sì mọ̀ pé kò wúlò fún àwọn tó bá ní àrùn ìtọ ṣúgá Type 1.

translation.en: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.
translation.yo: Ní ọjọ́ Ajé, Sara Danius, akọ̀wé àgbà ti ẹgbẹ́ Nobel fún ìtàn àròsọ ní ilé ẹ̀ka Swedin, tí wọ́n kéde ní ètò kan lóri rẹ́díò lóri rẹ́díò Svergies ní Sweden, àwọn ẹgbk kò lè dé ọ̀dọ̀ BobDylan nípa bíborí ní 2016 Nobel Prize Literature, ó ti rẹ̀ wọ́n láti kàn si.

translation.en: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."
translation.yo: Daniusi wipe, “Nisin a o se nkankan. Mo ti meeli ranse mo de ti pe si awon ajo sise timo timo re won de fun mi lesi to loyaya. Fun igba yi, o daniloju pe iyen ti to.”

translation.en: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.
translation.yo: Tẹ́lẹ̀rí, olùdarí àgbà iléeṣẹ́ Ring, Jamie Siminoff ní iléeṣẹ́ náà bẹ̀rẹ̀ iṣẹ́ nígbà tí aago ẹnu ọ̀nà òhun kò dún sókè látinú ṣọ́ọ̀bù dé inú gáràjì.

translation.en: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.
translation.yo: O ko ago ilekun WiFi, O wi.

translation.en: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.
translation.yo: Siminoff sọ pé ọjà lọ sókè lẹ́yìn tí òun hàn nínú eré Shark Tank lọ́dún 2013, ní ibi tí àwọn aláṣẹ eré ti ṣẹ́ pẹ̀ẹ́ lórí ìkówó lé eré ìbẹ̀rẹ̀.

translation.en: In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC.
translation.yo: Ni eba ipari odun 2017, Siminoff fi ara han lori itakun mohun maworan ti awon ontaja QVC.

translation.en: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.
translation.yo: Òrùká sì parí ęjọ́ pẹ̀lú ìlé Iṣẹ́ aláàbò tí wọ́n jọ ń figagbága- Ile Iṣẹ́ Nlá ADT.

translation.en: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.
translation.yo: Nígbàtí àwárí òògùn kan fojú hàn láti dín ikú èbólà kù, títí di àsìkò yìí, kò tí i sí òògùn kan pàtó tí a sàfihàn pé ó lágbára láti tọ́jú ààrùn tó wà nílẹ̀.

translation.en: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.
translation.yo: Àmúlùmálà apakòkòrò kan, ZMapp, ṣàfihàn ìlérí ní pápá, ṣùgbọ́n àwọn ẹ̀kọ́ ti tẹ́lẹ́ tóka pé o ní àǹfàní tó kéré láti dènà ikú.

translation.en: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.
translation.yo: Ní ìtọ́wò PALM ZMapp jẹ́ gẹ́gẹ́ bí ìṣàkóso o túmọ̀ si wípé àwọn onímọ̀ sayensi fi ṣe gbendeke wọ́n dẹ̀ fi wé àwọn ogun mẹ́ta ìyóku.

translation.en: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.
translation.yo: Ẹgbẹ́ Ajìjàkadi ilẹ̀ Àmẹ́ríkà fọwọ́ sí lẹtà ìgbìmọ̀ Olympics, wọ́n sì gbà á wọlé pé Àpapọ̀-Ebi-Olympics nilò láti rí dájú pé wọ́n pèsè àyíká tí ó dára fún àwọn oníjàkadì/asáré-ìje wa gbogbo.

translation.en: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.
translation.yo: A gba ọ̀rọ̀ USOC pé a lẹ̀ sin ànfàní àwọn eléré ìdárayá wa àti àwọn ẹgbe ìdárayá, àti eré ìdárayá wọn tí a bá tẹ̀síwájú pẹ̀lú ayipada tó ní túmọ̀ ní ilé ìṣe wa, ju yiyo ìwé aṣe kuro.

translation.en: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.
translation.yo: Eréje Gymnastics ti ilẹ̀ USA sàtìlẹyìn fún ìwádìí olómìnira tí ó lè tan ìmọ́lẹ̀ lórí àsìlò ìpín ní àwọn tó móríye ìsẹ̀lẹ̀ Larry Nassar sàpéjúwe pẹ̀lú akitiyan. ní kò bá ti lọ láì rí fún ọjọ́ pípẹ́ àti gbígba àwọn àyípadà tó yẹ.

translation.en: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.
translation.yo: Àwọn Asángun ilẹ̀ USA ati USOC ní àfojúsùn kanáà — èyí tó mún kí ààbò eré ìdárayá ìsangun àtawọn míran wà fáwọn eléréje láti le ma siṣẹ́ tọ àlá wọn ní àyíká tó láàbò, tó dára tó sì seégbé.

translation.en: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.
translation.yo: Ni gbogbo 1960S Bresinski sise fun Johannu F Kenedi gege bi onimoran re, o tun sise fun isakoso Lindoni B Jonsin.

translation.en: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.
translation.yo: Lákòókò ìsàlẹ́ṣà ọdún 1976, ó gba Carter nímọ̀ràn lórí ilẹ̀ òkèrè, lẹ́yìn èyí ó jẹ́ olùdámọ̀ràn ààbò àpapọ̀ (NSA) láti ọdún 1977 sí 1981, ẹni tó gbapò Henry Kissinger.

translation.en: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.
translation.yo: Bi i NSA, ó ran Carter lọ́wọ́ ní yíyanjú Ètò Àgbáyé, bí i Camp David Accords ti ọdún 1978; mímú áyípadà bá àjọsepọ̀ ilẹ̀ US–China ní ọwọ ìparí 1970s; Ìjagbara àwọn ilẹ̀ Iran tí ó yorí sí rògbòdìyàn ìdógo àwọn Iran ní ọdún, 1979; àti yíyalu àwọn Soviet ní Afghanistan ní ọdún 1979.

translation.en: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.
translation.yo: Fíìmú tó sàfihàn Ryan Gosling àti Emma Stone gba yíyàn nì gbogbo éka pàtàkì.

translation.en: Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively.
translation.yo: Goslini àti Okuta yege fún ìbò Eléré Ọkùnrin àti Eléré Obinrin ní kọ̀kan wọn.

translation.en: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.
translation.yo: Awọn ìsọ̀rí mìíràn ni, Àwòrán tó dára jù, Olùdarí, Àyàwòrán, Aṣaralóge, Asàtúntò-Fíìmù, Aṣàtúntò ohùn, Apohùnpọ̀, àti Akọ̀tà.

translation.en: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.
translation.yo: Orin méjì látinú àgbéléwò, ìdánwò (Àwọn òmùgọ̀ tó ń lá àlá) àti ìlú àwọn ìràwọ̀ ni wọ́n mún fún orin ojúlówó tó dára jù. ilé ìsiṣẹ́ Lionsgate ló gba ìyànsípò mẹ́rìndínlọ́gbọ̀n — jú àwọn ilé ìsiṣẹ̀ mìíràn lọ.

translation.en: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria.
translation.yo: Ní alẹ́ ọjọ́ àìkú, àrẹ oríll èdè Amẹ́ríkà Donald Trump, ní ọ̀rọ̀ rẹ̀ tí ó sọ nípasẹ̀ ọ̀gá oníròyìn, kéde pé àwọn ọmọ ogun US ma fi ìlú Syria sílẹ̀.

translation.en: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.
translation.yo: Won se ikede naa leyin ti Trumpi ba Aare Toki Resep Tayipi Edogani lori ago.

translation.en: Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.
translation.yo: Turkey yíò pẹ̀lú àmójútó ìdábòbò àwọn ọlótè ISIS tí wọ́n mú, èyí tí àlàyé fi síta , àwọn orílẹ̀-èdè Yúróòpù tí kọ̀ jálè láti fi ipá gbé padà sí ìlú wọn.

translation.en: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.
translation.yo: Èyì kò ṣàrídájú pé ó kéré jù àwọn dinosaurs ní ìyẹ́,ọ̀rọ̀ tó dájú tí ó ti tànká, ṣùgbọ́n ó pèsè ẹ̀kúnrẹ́rẹ́ àlàyé egungun ẹranko dinosaurs bíi àwọ́ àti títò lanà mẹt.

translation.en: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.
translation.yo: Awon onimo sayensi wipe iye eranko naa je awo sesnut- burawuni lori pelu awo sisi tabi awo-karotenoidi labe.

translation.en: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.
translation.yo: Wíwá náà tún fúni lóyẹ sí ìtànkálè ti àwọn ìyé nínú ẹyẹ.

translation.en: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.
translation.yo: Nítorí ìyẹ́ dánísọ̀̀ kò ní ọpá tó gbó káká, tí wọ́n ń pè ní rachis, ṣùgbọ́n ó ní àwọn àbùdá ìyé mìíràn – barbs àti barbules – àwọn aṣèwádìí sọ ohun tó jọ́ wípé rachis ṣeéṣe kí o jẹ́ àbùdá ìyẹ́ tí ó ti wà tipẹ́ síwájú àwọn ìyók.

translation.en: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.
translation.yo: Ohun tó dàbí ìyẹ dábàá pé kí wọ́n má lò nínu ọkọ̀ òfurufú ṣùgbọ́n fún títọ́ ara gbígbónà sọ́nà tàbí láti ṣàfihàn. Àwọn aṣèwádìí da lábàá pé, kódà èyí jẹ́ ìrù ọmọ dinosaur, àpẹrẹ rẹ ṣàfihàn ti àgbàlagbà.

translation.en: The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.
translation.yo: Àwọn aṣàwárí dalábàá pé, bí ètí bá jẹ́ ìrù ọmọ dinosaur, àpẹrẹ rẹ̀ ṣàfihàn ti àgbàlagbà kìn ṣe ti ọmọdé.

translation.en: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.
translation.yo: Àdó olóró tí wọ́n so mọ ọkọ̀ tí wọ́n wa lọ sí àgọ́ àwọn ọlọ́pàá ní Gaziantep, lórílẹ̀èdèTurkey, láàárọ̀ àná pa ọlọ́pàá méjì, tí ó sì ṣe àwọn tó tó ogún léṣe.

translation.en: The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers.
translation.yo: Ọfíìsì Gómínà sọ pé mọ́kàndínlógún nínú àwọn tí ó fi ara pa jẹ́ ọlọ́pàá.

translation.en: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.
translation.yo: Ọlọ́pa sọ pé àwọn funra sí ọmọ ogun Daesh (ISIL) fún ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ ná.

translation.en: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.
translation.yo: Wọn rí ìsàmúlò ìlànà kan náà lórí oòrùn bí i ti ìràwọ̀: Ìṣe gbogbo àwọn ìràwọ̀ ni a kíyèsí pé yíyí wọn àti ìse wọn nìkan ni ó ń darí wọn, kò sí nǹkan mìíràn.

translation.en: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.
translation.yo: A máà n lo luminositi ati iyipo papọ̀ láti fi mọ onka rosbi irawo, ti o ní Ṣe pẹ̀lú bí olasma Ṣe wàn s.

translation.en: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.
translation.yo: Bí nọ́ḿbà Rossby bá se kéré tó, bẹ́ẹ̀ náà ni iye ìràwọ̀ kò se ní lágbára sí ní ìtọ́ka sí ìdápadà sẹ́yìn agbérin.

translation.en: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions.
translation.yo: Nínú ìrìnàjò rẹ´, Iwasaki bọ sínú wàhálà ní ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ ìgbà.

translation.en: He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.
translation.yo: Àwọn ajalèlókun ló jàálólè, wọ́n jalè ní Tibet nípa lílo ajá elégbọn, ó sá kúrò nínu ìgbáyàwó rẹ wọ́n sì mu ní India.

translation.en: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.
translation.yo: Eto 802.11n sise pelu eto igbohun si afefe 2.4Ghz ati 5.0Ghz.

translation.en: This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios.
translation.yo: Èyí yíò fún ní àǹfànni láti padà sẹ́yìn pẹ̀lú 802.11a, 802.11b àti 802.11g, èyí tó pèsè ibùdó o ní rádíò méjì.

translation.en: The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.
translation.yo: Ìyára méjìlélẹ̀gbẹrin ó lé mọ́kànlá ni wọ́n má ń yára jùlọ pẹ̀lú àkọsílẹ̀ tíọ́rì tó gajù jẹ́ ẹgbẹ̀taMbit/s.

translation.en: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.
translation.yo: Dufaali to ti Ṣe ìgbéyàwó pẹ̀lú Ọmọ méjì o fí bẹ́ẹ̀ dá Mila, ti ìtàn náà tan mó, lọ́rùn.

translation.en: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."
translation.yo: Nígbà tí a bèrè fún ìdásí, Miller sọ pé, “Mike ma ń sọ̀rọ̀ jù nípa kíkà... Mò ń gbáradìnítorínà mi kò gba ǹkan tí ó sọ.”

translation.en: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.
translation.yo: “A ó tiraka láti gé ohun tí ó ń jáde carbon dioxide lóní ìwọ̀n GDP pẹ̀lú àmì tó farahàn bí yíò bá fi di 2020 láti ìpele 2005 gẹ́gẹ́ bí” Hu se sọ.

translation.en: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.
translation.yo: Kò sàgbékalẹ̀ iye kankan fún ègé náà, sọ pé wọ́n yíò se é ní ìbámu àbájáde ọrọ̀ ajé ilẹ̀ China.

translation.en: Hu encouraged developing countries "to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."
translation.yo: Hu gba àwọn orílẹ̀èdè tó sẹ̀sẹ̀ ń dàgbà níyànjú láti “kọ ọ̀nà àtijọ́ tí wọ́n má ń ba àyíká jẹ́ saájú kí wọ́n tó tún un se bóbá yá.”

translation.en: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."
translation.yo: O fikun pé “kí wọ́n máṣe, síbẹ̀síbẹ̀, wọ́n ma sọ fún láti pọndandan rẹ kọjá ìpele ìdàgbàsóké, ojúṣe àti agbár.”

translation.en: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today.
translation.yo: Ẹgbẹ́ aṣèwádìí ilẹ̀ Iraq se àgbékalẹ̀ àbábọ̀ rẹ̀ ní nǹkan bí i aago méjìlá ọ̀sán òní.

translation.en: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.
translation.yo: Ó sèkìlọ̀ wípé kò sií ẹnikẹ́ni tó lè fọwọ́ sọ̀yà wípé ìgbésẹ̀kíìgbésẹ̀ tí ilẹ̀ Iraq bá gbé lásìkò yìí kò lè paná ìjà ẹgbẹ́jẹgbẹ́, làásìgbò tó ń peléke òun èyí tó lẹ̀ mórí lé rògbòdìyàn.

translation.en: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.
translation.yo: Àbájádẹ bèrè pèlú ìsìpè fún ìjíròrò gbàngba àti ìgbédìdẹ ìpohùnpọ̀ ní orílè-èdè Améríkà nípa àwọn ípinnu tó ní sẹ pélù Ààrin Gúngún Ìlà-oòrùn.

translation.en: The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction.
translation.yo: Ìjábọ̀ náà jẹ́ ǹkan tó le gan ní gbogbo ẹ̀yà ìlànà tuntun ti àwọn adarí sí ìlú Iraq ó sì sọ pé kí wọ́n yí ọ̀nà padà.

translation.en: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.
translation.yo: Ọ̀kan lára àwọn àlàkalẹ̀ méjìdínlọ́gọ́rin ni wípé wọ́n gbọ́dọ̀ gbé ìgbésẹ̀ ìlànà òsèlú kó tó di òpin odún yìí láti le gba ibodè Iraq tako ìdásí tó le, àti sísàtúngbékalẹ̀ àjọsepọ̀ tó dánmọ́rán pẹ̀láwọn alájọgbé.

translation.en: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.
translation.yo: Senato to wa lori oye ati Aya Aare Arabirin Kristina Fenandesi de Kisna kede ipe ohun fe wo idije aare ni irole anaa ni La Plata, ilu ti o je 50 kilometers (31 miles) si Bwenos Aresi.

translation.en: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.
translation.yo: Arábìnrin Kirchner kéde èróngbà láti díje dunpò ààrẹ ilé ìseré ìtàgé Argentine, ibùdó kanáà tí ó lò fún ìpolongo rẹ̀ fún ìdìbò asòfin gẹ́gẹ́ bí ọmọ ẹgbẹ́ aṣojú ẹkùn Buenos Aires.

translation.en: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."
translation.yo: Ìjiyàn náà bẹ̀rẹ̀ láti àríyàn jiyàn lóri owó ìtura àtí àtúnkọ́ ilé ní ìgbà Ọrikénì, tí àwọn konsafetifu tí fi yẹ̀yẹ́ sọ lórúkọ “Ìṣòwò Olinsi Titun Buṣì”.

translation.en: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.
translation.yo: Ìbániwí tí kò le ti agbára àtúnkọ́lé tí fẹ́ gbé iṣẹ́ àtúnkọ́lé fún àwọn ọmọ ìlú Washington.

translation.en: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.
translation.yo: Ó kọjá èyan milionu mẹ́rin tó lọsí Romu fún ìsìnkú náà.

translation.en: The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square.
translation.yo: Iye àwọn ènìyàn tí ó péjọ pọ̀ tóbẹ́ẹ̀ gẹ́ tí ó fi jẹ́ pé kò ṣe é ṣe fún gbogbo ènìyàn láti rí àyè wọlé fún ìsìnkú ní ilé ìjọsìn St. Peter.

translation.en: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.
translation.yo: Ọnírúurú àwọn ẹ̀rọ amóhùnmáwòrán tójú wọn tóbi ní a sàfilọ́lẹ̀ káàkiri agbègbè ní ilẹ̀ Roomu láti lè jẹ́ kàwọn ènìyàn wo ayẹyẹ.

translation.en: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.
translation.yo: Ni ọpọ awọn ilu omiran ni Italy ati ni iyoku agbaye, papa julọ ni Poland, iru agbekalẹ bayi wa, eyi ti opolopo eniyan ri.

translation.en: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.
translation.yo: Àwọn akọ̀tàn ti se àríwísí àwọn ètò ìmúlò àtẹ̀yìnwá ọ́fíìsì àjọ àpapọ̀ òtẹlẹ̀múyé fún lílo ìsúná rè lòrì àwọn ìsẹ̀lẹ̀ tó rọrùn láti yanjú, ní pàtàkì àwọn ọ̀ràn jíjí ọkọ̀ áyọkẹ́lẹ́ pẹ̀lú èróngbá láti se ìgbélárugẹ fún ódiwọ̀n àsẹyọrì rẹ.

translation.en: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.
translation.yo: Àpérò bẹ̀rl sí ní kó owó sí obcenity initiative ní fiscal n\i ọdún 2005 ó sì so pé àwọn FBI nílái fi aṣojú mẹ́wàá sílẹ̀ fún fíìmù àgbàlagbà.

translation.en: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.
translation.yo: Robin Uthappa wọlé pẹ̀lú góòlù tó ga jùlọ bí i àádọ́rin pẹ̀lú bọ́ọ̀lù mọ́kànlélógì nípa gbígbá mẹ́rin mọ́kànlá àti mẹ́fà méjì.

translation.en: Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership.
translation.yo: Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, ṣe dáadáa tí wọ́n sì ní ọgọ́rùn ún àjọsepọ̀.

translation.en: But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.
translation.yo: Ṣùgban lẹ́yìn tí wọ́n sọ captain wicket nù India ṣe 36 runs tí wọ́n sì sọ wicket 7 nù láti parí rẹ̀.

translation.en: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.
translation.yo: Olori oorilrede U.S to n je George W. Bush de si ilu Singapore ni aro ojo ikerindinlogun ninu osu kokanla, eyi to fi bere awoyika ilu Asia olose kan.

translation.en: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.
translation.yo: Igbákejì Olórí Singapo Wongi Kani Sengi ló kíi o dẹ̀ sọ̀rọ̀ ní ba isòwò àti ọ̀rọ̀ ìhàlẹ̀ pẹ̀lú Olórí Singapo Lee Hsien Loongi.

translation.en: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.
translation.yo: Lẹ́yin àdánu ọ̀sẹ̀ kan nínú ètò ìdìbò ìdajì sáà, Bush sọ fún àkójọpọ̀ àwọn èro rẹ̀ nípa sísàmúngbòrò kátàkárà ní ilẹ̀ Asia.

translation.en: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.
translation.yo: Adari ijọba Stephen Harper ti gba lati fi iwe erongba ijọba lori “Clean Air Act” ranṣẹ si ijoko awon ọmọ ẹgbẹ fun agbeyẹwo, ki oto di kika fun igba elekeji lọyin ipade ọjọ iṣẹgun oni iṣẹju mẹẹdọgbọn pẹlu adari NDP Jack Layton ni PMO.

translation.en: Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative party's environmental bill.
translation.yo: Laytoni ti bèèrè fún àyípadà lórí òfin ìhùwàsí àyíká lákòókò ìpàdé pẹ̀lú PM, bèèrè pé kí wọ́n se àtúnkọ àbádòfin ìhùwà ẹgbẹ́ sí àyíká.

translation.en: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.
translation.yo: Láti ìgbà tí ìjọba àpapọ̀ ti gba ìsúná ilé ìwòsàn Mersey tí ó wà ní Devonport, ní Tasmania, ìjọba ìbílẹ̀ àti àwọn Aṣojú ìjọbá àpapọ̀ ti bu ẹnu àtẹ́ lu ìgbésẹ̀ yìí gẹ́gẹ́ bí ètè tí ó ní í ṣe pẹlú ètò ìdìbò tó ń bọ̀ ní oṣù kọkànlá.

translation.en: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.
translation.yo: Ṣùgbọ́n Mínísítà àgbà, John Howard ti sọ wípé àbá náà wà fún àbò àwọn ohun èlò ilé ìwòsàn náà, kí ìjọba Tasmanian má ba à fi wọ́lẹ̀, ní gbigbé milíọ́nù márùndínlógójì dọ́là sílẹ̀.

translation.en: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.
translation.yo: Gẹ́gẹ́ bí ìròyìn tuntun ṣe wí, ìpelé odò takasí pé wọ́n fa tsunami ni. Àwọn iṣe tsunami ti wọ́n ṣàkọsílẹ̀ ní tòsí Pago Pago àti Niue.

translation.en: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.
translation.yo: Wọn ò jésì ìpalára tàbí ìjàmba púpọ̀jù ní Tonga, ṣùgbọ́n iná ṣẹ́jú fún ìgbà kan, tó mú kí àwọn aláṣẹ Tonga má rí ìkilọ̀ ìjì súnámì tí PWC gbéjáde.

translation.en: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.
translation.yo: Àwọn ilé ìwé mẹ́rìnlà ní Hawaii tó wà ní tàbí tó wà ní ẹ̀gbẹ́ etí òkun ti jẹ́ títìpa ní ọjọ́rú pẹ̀lú bí wọ́n ṣe yọ ìkìlọ̀ kúrò.

translation.en: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.
translation.yo: Ààrẹ orilé-ẹ̀dẹ̀ Améríkà George W. Bush gba ìkẹ́de náà wọlé.

translation.en: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."
translation.yo: Ẹni tó sọ̀rọ̀ fún Búsì Godoni Johanudro pé ilérí Koria Ariwa ní “ìgbésẹ̀ nlá sọ́na àlébá láti yọ irin ogún nukilia kúrò ní irekusu Koria.

translation.en: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.
translation.yo: Ìjì lílé kẹwàá ti sáà Atlantic Hurricane, Subtropical Storm Jerry, ni wọ́n sẹ̀dà ní ọ̀sà Atlantic lónìí.

translation.en: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this point Jerry poses no threat to land.
translation.yo: Ibùdó Ìjì líli Orílẹ̀ èdè (NHC) sọ pé ní àsìkò yìí Jerry kò lè ṣe ǹkan kan ní orí ilẹ̀.

translation.en: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees.
translation.yo: Àwọn ẹgbẹ́ ológun ilẹ̀ Amẹ́ríkà tí ẹ̀ka onímọ̀ ẹ̀rọ, ṣe ìṣirò pé tí òjọ̀ bá rọ ìwọ̀n íǹṣì mẹ́fà péré, yóò dí ojú ihò ewé tó ti bàjẹ́ tẹ́lẹ.

translation.en: The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped.
translation.yo: Ìpín Kẹ̀sán, tó ní ìrírí ẹ̀kúnwọ́ tó ga tó ìwọ̀n bàtà ogún nínú ìjì líle Katrina, lọ́wọ́ lọ́wọ́ ti máa ní gíga tó ègbé ikùn bí ìdarí omi tó sún mọ́tí di bíbò mọ́lẹ. .

translation.en: Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.
translation.yo: Omi ń sàn lórí levee ní apá kan níwọ̀n fífẹ̀ ẹsẹ̀ ọgọ́rùn ún.

translation.en: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month.
translation.yo: Alákòóso tó wọ́pọ̀ Adam Cuerden ti fi ìpinlẹẹ̀mí ọkàn hàn lórí àwọn ìparẹ́ tó wáyé lákòókò tó ń sọ̀rọ̀ ní Wikinews lóṣù tó kọjá.

translation.en: "He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."
translation.yo: “Ó [Wales] parọ́ fún wa láti ìbẹ̀rẹ̀. Àkọ́kọ́ nípa síseré àfi bí èyí wà fú idí òfin. Ìkejì, nípa dídíbọ́n pé òun gbọ́ wa títí di bí ó se pa iṣẹ́ ọnà rẹ́.”

translation.en: The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media.
translation.yo: Ìkórira agbègbè náà fa agbára láti kọ ìlànà tó ní ṣe pẹ̀lú ìbálòpọ́ fún ojú òpó tó gba àlejò tó mílíọ́nù mídíà gbangba.

translation.en: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.
translation.yo: Isé sísẹ náà lọ́pọ̀lọpọ̀ jẹ fún ẹ̀kọ́, sùgbón kíkọ́ ètò náà jẹ láti sẹ àfiwẹ́ra àkíyèsí tó di sísẹ nípa Sagirrarius lójú òrun.

translation.en: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter.
translation.yo: Awon agbara iji omi lo le ko ipa ti egbe naa n wa laarin ohun dudu galaksi ati nkan dudu Ona Milik.

translation.en: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.
translation.yo: Gẹ́lẹ́ bí òṣùpá ṣe ń ṣe pẹlú ayé, tí yóò sì jẹ́ kí ó gún, bẹ́ẹ̀ ni Milky Way ṣe máa ń ṣe pẹ̀lú Sagittarius galaxy.

translation.en: The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does.
translation.yo: O ṣeéṣe fún àwọn onímọ̀ sáyẹnsì latí pinu pé ohun dúdú ma ń ran ohun dúdú mín bí ohun désé ṣe ma n ràn án.

translation.en: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.
translation.yo: Àlàyé yìí sọ pé àwọn ǹkan dúdú tó wà ní àyíkà galaxy ló wà ní àyíká galaxy gẹ́gẹ́ bí halo, àwọn ǹkan kékèké ló gbedúró.

translation.en: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant.
translation.yo: Iroyin lati ori amohunmaworan fihan pe efin n jade lati inu koriko wa.

translation.en: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.
translation.yo: Àwọn aláṣẹ abẹ́lé ti ń sèkìlọ̀ fáwọn òsìṣẹ́ lágbègbè iléeṣẹ́ láti dúró sílé, pa ẹ̀rọ amúnlétutù, kí wọ́n má sì mú omi ẹ̀rọ.

translation.en: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.
translation.yo: Ní ìbámu pẹ̀lú àjọ ohun àmúsagbàra ti Japan, kẹ́míkà tóní ìpalára àti iodine tí di àwárí ní ilé́ isẹ́ náà.

translation.en: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.
translation.yo: Awon alase ma n daba pe eyi toka si pe awon kolo to n di epo uraniumu ni ni oju ibe le ti be ati pe o n jo.

translation.en: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal.
translation.yo: Dr. Tony Moll sàwárí Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) ní KwaZulu-Natal lẹ́kùn South African.

translation.en: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."
translation.yo: Ninu iforoworo kan, o wi pe irufe titun naa o n “danilamu pupo o de n fa ijaya nitoripe osuwon iku ti o le sokun fa, o ga.”

translation.en: Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers.
translation.yo: Dokita Moli ro wipe awon alaisan kan leti fara ko kokoro naa ni ile-iwosan,ati wipe meji lara won je osise eleto ile-iwosan naa.

translation.en: In one year's time, an infected person may infect 10 to 15 close contacts.
translation.yo: Bí yíò bá fi di ọdún kan sí àkókò yìí, ènìyàn kan tó ní ààrùn lè kó o ran ẹni mẹ́wàá sí márùndínlógún mííràn tó bá ní ìfarakínra.

translation.en: However, the percentage of XDR-TB in the entire group of people with tuberculosis still seems to be low; 6,000 of the total 330,000 people infected at any particular moment in South Africa.
translation.yo: Àmọ́ṣa, ìda XDR-TB nínú gbogbo àwọn èèyà tó ní ikọ́ àwúgbẹ sì kéré níye: ẹgbẹ̀rún mẹ́fà nínú èèyàn ọ̀jì lé lọ́ọ̀dúnrún ó dín mẹ́wàá ni ó ní lákòókò kan nílẹ̀ South Africa.

translation.en: The satellites, both of which weighed in excess of 1,000 pounds, and traveling at approximately 17,500 miles per hour, collided 491 miles above the Earth.
translation.yo: Sátẹ̀láìtì náà, méjèjì tó wọ́n ju 1000 pounds lọ,tí wọ́n s;i rin ìrìn àjò tó tó máàlì 17,500 ní wákàtí,kọlu máàlì 491 lórí ilẹ̀.

translation.en: Scientists say the explosion caused by the collision was massive.
translation.yo: Àwọn onímò Sayensi wípé búbúgbàmà ti ìkọlù náà jẹ títóbi gan.

translation.en: They are still trying to determine just how large the crash was and how the Earth will be affected.
translation.yo: Won si n sagbeyewo bii ijamba naa se tobi to ati ipa ti o ma ko lori Aye.

translation.en: The United States Strategic Command of the U.S. Department of Defense office is tracking the debris.
translation.yo: Àṣẹ ọgbọ́n ti United States tí ẹ̀ka olùgbèjà U.S wà àwọn ǹkan tó kù.

translation.en: The result of plotting analysis will be posted to a public website.
translation.yo: Èsì yíya àwòrán yíò jáde sórí ìtàkùn ayélujára o ní gbogbogbò.

translation.en: A doctor who worked at Children's Hospital of Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania will be charged with aggravated murder after her mother was found dead in the trunk of her car Wednesday, authorities in Ohio say.
translation.yo: Àwọn agbófinro ni Ohio sọ pé, Oníṣègùn tó ṣiṣẹ́ ni ilé ìwòsàn àwọn ọmọdé tí ó wà ní Pittsburgh, ni Pennsylvania ni wọn yóò fi ẹ̀sùn ìpànìyàn kàn lẹ́yìn tí wọn bá òkú ìyá rẹ̀ lẹ́yìn ọkọ̀ rẹ̀ ní ọjọ́rú.

translation.en: Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, was found in Blue Ash, Ohio, a suburb approximately 15 miles north of Cincinnati lying on the ground beside the road in a T-shirt and underwear in an apparently heavily medicated state.
translation.yo: Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, ẹni ọdún mọ́kàndínlọ́gbọ̀n ní wọ́n rí ní Blue Ash, Ohio, agbègbè tó dàbí máìlì márùndínlógún sí àríwá Cincinnati, tó sùn sí ẹ̀gbẹ́ ojú ọ̀nà nínú aṣọ T-shirt àti àwọ̀tẹ́lẹ̀ nípò tó sàfihàn pé ó ń lo òògùn.

translation.en: She directed officers to her black Oldsmobile Intrigue which was 500 feet away.
translation.yo: Ó darí àwọn agbófinró sí ọkọ̀ dúdú rẹ̀ èyí tó wa bí i ìwọ̀n ẹsẹ̀ ẹ̀ẹ́dẹ́gbẹ̀ta sí i.

translation.en: There, they found the body of Saroja Balasubramanian, 53, covered with blood-stained blankets.
translation.yo: Níbè, wọn rí ará Saroja Balasubramanian, métàlẹ́làáadọ́ta, tí a bò pèlú àwọn aṣo ìbora ẹ̀jẹ.

translation.en: Police said that the body appeared to have been there for about a day.
translation.yo: Àwọn ọlọ́pàá sọ pé ó dàbí ẹni wípé ara náà ti wà níbẹ̀ fún bí i ọjọ́ kan.

translation.en: The first cases of the disease this season were reported in late July.
translation.yo: Ìgbà àkọ́kọ́ tí wọ́n ma rí àrùn náà ní àkókò yìí ni ní ìparí oṣù kéje.

translation.en: The disease is carried by pigs, which then migrates to humans through mosquitos.
translation.yo: Àwọn elede lo ma n gbé àrùn náà, a wá ti ara ẹ̀fọn fọ́nká sí ọmọ èyan.

translation.en: The outbreak has prompted the Indian government to undertake such measures as deployment of pig catchers in seriously affected areas, distributing thousands of mosquito curtains and spraying pesticides.
translation.yo: Àjàkálẹ̀ ti mún kí ìjọba ilẹ̀ India gbé ìgbésẹ̀ láti gbé ìgbésẹ̀ fi darí àwọn tó ń mún ẹlẹ́dẹ̀ láwọn agbègbè típalára wà, pín ẹgbẹ̀lẹ́gbẹ̀ kọ́tìnì ẹ̀fọn àti òògùn fínfín ẹ̀fọn.

translation.en: Several million vials of encephalitis vaccine have also been promised by the government, which will help prepare health agencies for next year.
translation.yo: Àwọn ìjọba ti ṣe lérí pé ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ abẹ́rẹ́ àjẹsára encephalitis, èyí tó ma rànwálọ́wọ́ láti gbáradì fún àwọn àjọ ìlera fún ọdún tó ń bọ̀.

translation.en: Plans for vaccines to be delivered to the historically most affected areas this year were delayed due to lack of funds and low prioritisation relative to other diseases.
translation.yo: Wọn dínwọ̀ ètò láti jíṣẹ́ ògùn maporo sí agbègbè tó kópa jù nítorí àìsowo àti pe wọn ò fiṣe nkan pàtàkì láàrín àwọn àrùn.

translation.en: In 1956 Słania moved to Sweden, where three years later he began work for the Swedish Post Office and became their chief engraver.
translation.yo: Ní ọdún 1956, Slania kó lọ sí Sweden, níbití ó ti bẹ̀rẹ̀ iṣẹ́ fún ilé iṣẹ́ ìfìwéránṣẹ́ Sweden lẹ́yìn ọdún mẹ́ta tó sì di olórí ayàwòrán.

translation.en: He produced over 1,000 stamps for Sweden and 28 other countries.
translation.yo: O se staampi oye to ju 1,000 fun Swidini ati awon ilu 28 omiran.

translation.en: His work is of such recognized quality and detail that he is one of the very few "household names" among philatelists. Some specialize in collecting his work alone.
translation.yo: Iṣẹ́ rẹ̀ ní gbajúmọ̀ àti tó jẹ́ pé ó wà lára àwọn “òrúkọ ìdílé” díẹ̀ lára àwọn filatelisti. Àwọn kan ma n ṣa iṣẹ́ rẹ̀ nìkan.

translation.en: His 1,000th stamp was the magnificent "Great Deeds by Swedish Kings" by David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl in 2000, which is listed in the Guinness Book of World Records.
translation.yo: Òǹtẹ̀ ọgọ́rùń rẹ̀ tóbi gan “Great Deeds by Swedish Kings” nípasẹ́ David Klocker Ehrenstrahi ní ọdún 2000, tí a kọ sílẹ̀ nínú ìwé Guiness of World Records.

translation.en: He was also engaged in engraving banknotes for many countries, recent examples of his work including the Prime Ministerial portraits on the front of the new Canadian $5 and $100 bills.
translation.yo: Ó tún lọ́wọ́ nínú yíya àwòrán owó fún ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ orílẹ̀èdè, àpẹrẹ iṣẹ́ rẹ̀ lọ́wọ́lọ́wọ́ ni àwòrán olóòtú àgbà níwájú owó Canada tuntun bíi dọ́là márùn ún àti ọgọ́rùn ún dọ́là.

translation.en: After the accident occurred, Gibson was transported to a hospital but died shortly afterwards.
translation.yo: Lẹ́yìn tí ìjàǹbá náà ṣẹlẹ̀, wọ́n gbé Gibson lọ sí ilé ìwòsàn ṣùgbọn kò pẹ́ lẹ́yìn rẹ̀ ni ó kú.

translation.en: The truck driver, who is aged 64, was not injured in the crash.
translation.yo: Awako to je omo odun 64, o sese ni ijamba oko naa.

translation.en: The vehicle itself was taken away from the scene of the accident at approximately 1200 GMT on the same day.
translation.yo: Wọn yọ ọkọ naa gangan kuro loju ibi ti ijamba naa ti ṣẹlẹ ni bii ago 1200 GMT lọjọ na.

translation.en: A person working in a garage near where the accident occurred said: "There were children waiting to cross the road and they were all screaming and crying."
translation.yo: Èèyàn kan tò ń siṣẹ́ ní ibi ìgbọ́kọ̀sí tó súnmọ́ ibi tí ìjàm̀bá ti wáyé ní “Àwọn ọmọ́dé ń dúró láti ré kọjá ojú pópó àti pé wọ́n ń pariwo bẹ́ẹ̀sì ni wọ́n ń sọkún.”

translation.en: They all ran back from where the accident had happened.
translation.yo: Gbogbo wọn sá kúrò níbití ìjàmbá ti wáyé.

translation.en: Other subjects on the agenda in Bali include saving the world's remaining forests, and sharing technologies to help developing nations grow in less-polluting ways.
translation.yo: Àwọn ǹkan tó wà lórí ètò ní Bali ní títọ́jú aginjú tó kùn ní àgbáyé, àti pínpín ìma ẹ̀ró láti ran àwọn orílẹ̀ èdè tó ṣì ń dàgbà dáadáa.

translation.en: The U.N. also hopes to finalize a fund to help countries affected by global warming to cope with the impacts.
translation.yo: UN tún ní ìrètí láti parí ìkówójọ láti ran àwọn orílẹ̀ èdè tó ní ìkọlù global warming lọ́wọ́.

translation.en: The money could go toward flood-proof houses, better water management, and crop diversification.
translation.yo: Owó náà lè jẹ́ fún kíkọ́ ilé tágbàrá kò le wọ̀, tí yíò le sàkóso omi dáadáa òhun dídari ohun ọ̀gbìn.

translation.en: Fluke wrote that the efforts by some to drown out women from speaking out about women’s health were unsuccessful.
translation.yo: Fluke ko wipe igbiyanju awon kan lati teri awon obinrin ki won ma ba soro nipa ailera awon obinrin mo lo jasi pabo.

translation.en: She came to this conclusion due to the multitude of positive comments and encouragement sent to her by both female and male individuals urging that contraception medication be considered a medical necessity.
translation.yo: Ó pinu pé nítorí ọ̀pọ̀ ọ̀rọ̀ àti àmoran dídára tí tọkùnrin tọbìrin firánṣẹ́ síi, tí wọ́n wípé kí òògùn tó ń dènà oyún jẹ́ dandan.

translation.en: When the fighting ceased after the wounded were transported to the hospital, about 40 of the other remaining inmates stayed in the yard and refused to return to their cells.
translation.yo: Nigba ti ija pari ti awon ti won farapa lo si ile iwosan, bi ogoji awon to seku ni ogba ewon duro si inu ogba ti won si ko jale lati wo inu ewon pada.

translation.en: Negotiators tried to rectify the situation, but the prisoners' demands are not clear.
translation.yo: Àwọn tó ń dúnàdùra gbìyànjú láti sàtúnse ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ náà, ṣùgbón ǹkan tí àwọn ęlẹ́wọ̀n fẹ́ ò yé ni.

translation.en: Between 10:00-11:00 pm MDT, a fire was started by the inmates in the yard.
translation.yo: Laarin ago 10:00-11:00 ale MDT, awon elewon to wa ninu ogba bere ina kan.

translation.en: Soon, officers equipped with riot gear entered the yard and cornered the inmates with tear gas.
translation.yo: Láìpẹ́, àwọnòṣìṣẹ́ tí wọ́n ti ró ni agbára láti kọjú ìjà wọ inú ọgbà, wọn sì muh àwọn ẹlẹwọ̀n pẹlú tajútaj.

translation.en: Fire rescue crews eventually doused the fire by 11:35 pm.
translation.yo: Àwọn panápaná pàpà pa ìná ní 11:35 pm.

translation.en: After the dam was built in 1963, the seasonal floods that would spread sediment throughout the river were halted.
translation.yo: Lẹ́yìn tí odò náà di kíkó ní 1963, àwọn àgbàrá àkókò tó má ń ta ẹrọ̀fọ̀ ká kiri ló di dídádúró.

translation.en: This sediment was necessary for creating sandbars and beaches, which served as wildlife habitats.
translation.yo: Àwọn gẹ̀dẹ̀gẹ́dẹ̀ yìí yẹ fún àti se yanrìn abẹ́ omi àti etí òkun èyí tí yí ò jẹ́ ibùgbé àwọn abẹ̀mí.

translation.en: As a result, two fish species have become extinct, and two others have become endangered, including the humpback chub.
translation.yo: Nítorínà ẹ̀yà ẹja méjì tí di ohun ìgbàgbé,bẹ́ẹ̀ àwọn méjì míràn wà nínú ewu, pẹ̀lú èyí tó suké.

translation.en: Although the water level will only rise a few feet after the flood, officials are hoping it will be enough to restore eroded sandbars downstream.
translation.yo: Biotilejepe ibi ti omi naa de a maa ga si leyin iji omi awon ofisa ni ireti pe o ma to lati da awon iyepe to ti ru sita pada si inu omi.

translation.en: No tsunami warning has been issued, and according to the Jakarta geophysics agency, no tsunami warning will be issued because the quake did not meet the magnitude 6.5 requirement.
translation.yo: Kòsí ìkìlọ̀ fún tsunami, àti gẹ́gẹ́ bí àjọ Jakarta geophysics ṣe sọ́,kòsí ìkìlọ̀ nítorí ilẹ̀ mímì kò dé 6.5.

translation.en: Despite there being no tsunami threat, residents started to panic and began to leave their businesses and homes.
translation.yo: Bótilẹ̀jẹ́ wípé kò sí ìdúnkòkò ilẹ̀ ríru, síbẹ̀ àwọn olùgbé tí ń fòyà, wón dè bẹ̀rẹ̀ síní fi okoòwò àti ilé wọn sílẹ̀.

translation.en: Although Winfrey was tearful in her farewell, she made it clear to her fans she will be back.
translation.yo: Lóòótọ́ Winfrey ń sọkún lákòókò ìdágbére rẹ̀, ó sọ s´ di mímọ̀ fáwọn olólùfẹ́ rẹ̀ pé òun padà bọ̀.

translation.en: "This is not going to be goodbye. This is the closing of one chapter and the opening of a new one."
translation.yo: “Eyi kii se o di gba. Eyi je ipari abala kan ati ibere titu.”

translation.en: Final results from Namibian presidential and parliamentary elections have indicated that the incumbent president, Hifikepunye Pohamba, has been reelected by a large margin.
translation.yo: Èsì ìdìbò ààrẹ àti tilé ìgbìmọ̀ asòfin ti sàfihàn wípé ààrẹ̀ tó wà lórí àlééfà Hifikepunye Pohamba náà ni wọ́n tún yàn sípò pẹ̀lú ààlà tó pọ̀.

translation.en: The ruling party, South West Africa People's Organisation (SWAPO), also retained a majority in the parliamentary elections.
translation.yo: Ẹ̀gbẹ́ tó n dari ìlú Egbe Guusu Iwo Oorun (SWAPO) nílo èyàn púpọ̀ ní ìbò ìgbìmọ̀ àwọn aṣòfin.

translation.en: Coalition and Afghan troops moved into the area to secure the site and other coalition aircraft have been sent to assist.
translation.yo: ọ̀wọ́ ogun Coalition àti ikọ̀ ogun Afghan wọ agbègbè náà láti gba ààyè àti àwọn ohun ìjagun ojú òfúrufú ti fi rànṣẹ́ láti ṣe ìrànlọ́wọ́.

translation.en: The crash occurred high up in mountainous terrain, and is believed to have been the result of hostile fire.
translation.yo: Ijamba naa sele ni ori oke giga, igbagbo si wa wipe ikanra ina ni o se okunfa re.

translation.en: Efforts to search for the crash site are being met by bad weather and harsh terrain.
translation.yo: Àwọn ìyànjú láti wá ibi ìjàmba náà ni kò ṣeése nítorí ojú ọjọ́ ti ko dára àti ibi gbogbo ilẹ̀ tí ò farajọra.

translation.en: The medical charity Mangola, Medecines Sans Frontieres and the World Health Organisation say it is the worst outbreak recorded in the country.
translation.yo: Àwọn ọlọ́re Mangola Medicien Sans Frontieres àti Ile Iṣe Ìlera Ìgbìmọ̀ Àgbáyé, wípé ìbẹ́sílẹ̀ àrùn naa lo buru jù ní gbogbo ìlú.

translation.en: Spokesman for Medecines Sans Frontiere Richard Veerman said: "Angola is heading for its worst ever outbreak and the situation remains very bad in Angola," he said.
translation.yo: Agbẹnusọ fún Medecines Sans Frontiere Richard Veerman sọọ́ di mímọ̀ orílẹ̀èdè Angola ń rárí wọ àkókò àjàkálẹ̀ tó burú jù tí ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ yìí sì burú jáì ní Angol.

translation.en: The games kicked off at 10:00am with great weather and apart from mid morning drizzle which quickly cleared up, it was a perfect day for 7's rugby.
translation.yo: Àwọn eré náà bẹ̀rẹ̀ ní aago mẹ́wàá òwúrọ̀ pẹ̀lú ojú ọjọ́ tí ó dára yàtọ̀ fún òjò wẹliwẹli tí ó tètè kásẹ̀ nílẹ̀, ó jẹ́ ọjọ́ tó dára fún ìdíje 7's rugby.

translation.en: Tournament top seeds South Africa started on the right note when they had a comfortable 26 - 00 win against 5th seeded Zambia.
translation.yo: Orile Ede South Africa tii se akopa ninu idije ti o da julo bere pelu aseyori ti o ga nigba ti won bori awon akegbe won lati orile ede Zambia ti o wa ni ori akaba karun pelu 26 - 00.

translation.en: Looking decidedly rusty in the game against their southern sisters, South Africa however steadily improved as the tournament progressed.
translation.yo: Pẹ̀lú pé ó dàbí pé wọn ò mọ̀ọ́ṣé lẹ́gbẹ́ àwọn ẹgbẹ́ wọn lápá guusu, Ilu Afrika alapa guusu túbọ̀ n ṣe dada bí ídíje náà ṣe n lọ.

translation.en: Their disciplined defence, ball handling skills and excellent team work made them stand out and it was clear that this was the team to beat.
translation.yo: Àwọn agbábọ́ọ̀lù dìfẹ́nsì wọn tó mọṣẹ́, ìsọwọ́ gbá bọ́ọ̀lù, àti àjùmọ̀se to gbámúse mún wan dá yàtọ̀, ó sì hàn gbangba pé àwọn ló tó nà.

translation.en: Officials for the city of Amsterdam and the Anne Frank Museum state that the tree is infected with a fungus and poses a public health hazard as they argue that it was in imminent danger of falling over.
translation.yo: Àwọn òsìsé ìlú Amsterdam àti ti Musiomu Anne Frank fi síta wípé igi náà ti kó ààrùn àwọn kòkòrò tí a lè fojúrí tí o si léwu fún ìlera ara ìlú gẹ́gẹ́ bí wọn se se àtẹnumọ́ wípé o lè fa ìjàmbà lọ́wọ́lọ́wọ́ nípa wíwó lulẹ̀.

translation.en: It had been scheduled to be cut down on Tuesday, but was saved after an emergency court ruling.
translation.yo: Wọ́n ti jùmọ̀ sọ pé wọ́n ma ge ní ọjọ́ ìṣẹ́gun, ṣùgbọ́n wọ́n fipamọ́ lẹ́yìn pàjáwìrì ẹjẹ́ ilé ẹjọ́.

translation.en: All of the cave entrances, which were named "The Seven Sisters", are at least 100 to 250 meters (328 to 820 feet) in diameter.
translation.yo: Gbogbo iwole okuta na, ti won pe ni “Awon Omo Iya Obirin Meje”, fe to mita 100 si 250 (ese 328 to 820).

translation.en: Infrared images show that the temperature variations from night and day show that they are likely caves.
translation.yo: Àwọn àwòrán atọ́ka fi hàn pé àwọn ìwọ́n òtútù àti ooru láti alẹ́ àti òòjọ́ èyí tó sàfihàn pé ó le dàbí ihò.

translation.en: "They are cooler than the surrounding surface in the day and warmer at night.
translation.yo: “Won tutu ju oju ayika ni osan won de lo si ni ale.”

translation.en: Their thermal behavior is not as steady as large caves on Earth that often maintain a fairly constant temperature, but it is consistent with these being deep holes in the ground," said Glen Cushing of the United States Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Team and of Northern Arizona University located in Flagstaff, Arizona.
translation.yo: “Ìhùwàsí fún gbígbóná kò sẹ dẹ́ẹ́dẹ́ẹ́ bi àwọn ihọ̀ nla lórí ilẹ̀ tí wọn sáábà ní ìwọ̀n òtútù to sẹ dẹ́ẹ́dẹ́ẹ́, sùgbón o wà ní ìbámu pèlá àwọn ihò jínjìn inú ilẹ̀ náà” Glen Cushin ti ìgbìmò Ìwádìá èka èkọ́ nípa ilé ohun awòràwọ̀ (USGS) àti ti ilé èkọ́ gíga Àríwá Arizona ní Flagstaff, Arizona sọ di mímọ̀.

translation.en: In France, voting has traditionally been a low-tech experience: voters isolate themselves in a booth, put a pre-printed sheet of paper indicating their candidate of choice into an envelope.
translation.yo: Ní ilẹ̀ Faranse, ètò ìdìbò ti di ìrírí tó kéré, àwọn olùdìbò ma ń yara wan sọ́tọ̀ nínú akoto, fi ìwé tó ń sàfihàn olùdíje dunpò wọn sínú àpò ìwé.

translation.en: After officials verify the voter's identity, the voter drops the envelope into the ballot box and signs the voting roll.
translation.yo: Lẹ́yìn tí àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ ti ṣàrídájú olùdìbò, olùdìbò a fi ẹnfílópì sínú apoti ìbò a dẹ̀ fọwọ́ sí iwé ìbò.

translation.en: French electoral law rather strictly codifies the proceedings.
translation.yo: Òfin ìdìbò ilẹ́ Faranse se àgbéjáde ìlànà òfin lóní danda.

translation.en: Since 1988, ballot boxes must be transparent so that voters and observers can witness that no envelopes are present at the start of the vote and that no envelopes are added except those of the duly counted and authorized voters.
translation.yo: Lati ọdun 1988, apoti idibo gbọdọ jẹ eyi ti o seeri fun awọn oludibo ati awọn oluworan lati ri wipe ko si apo iwe kankan ninu apoti ki idibo to bẹrẹ ati wipe ko si afikun apo iwe kankan yatọsi ti awọn oludibo ti a lu lonte.

translation.en: Candidates can send representatives to witness every part of the process. In the evening, votes are counted by volunteers under heavy supervision, following specific procedures.
translation.yo: Àwọn olùkópa lè fi aṣojú wọ́n ránṣẹ́ láti jẹ́rìsí gbogbo ètò náà. Ní alẹ́, àwọ́n tó fi ara wọ́n sílẹ̀ ka àwọn ìbò pẹ̀lú àbójútó tó le, tó sì tẹ̀lé àwọn ìlànà kan pàtó.

translation.en: ASUS Eee PC, earlier launched world-wide for cost-saving and functionality factors, became a hot topic in 2007 Taipei IT Month.
translation.yo: Ero ayarabiasa ti ASUS Eee, eyi ti won gbejade kaakiri agbaye fun edinwo ati isepataki amulo, di gbajugbaja ni osu Taipei IT ti 2007.

translation.en: But the consumer market on laptop computer will be radically varied and changed after ASUS was awarded in the 2007 Taiwan Sustainable Award by Executive Yuan of the Republic of China.
translation.yo: Sùgbọ́n ìtajà àwọn oníbàárà lórí ẹ̀rọ ayára bí àṣá lápútọọ̀pù yóó yàtọ̀ lọ́pọ̀ lẹ́yìn tí ASUS gba àmì ẹ̀yẹ nínú àmì ẹ̀yẹ Taiwan Sustainable Award by Executive Yuan ti ilẹ̀ olómìnira China.

translation.en: The station's web site describes the show as "old school radio theater with a new and outrageous geeky spin!"
translation.yo: Ojú ọ̀pọ́ weebu ibùdó náà sàpéjúwẹ àfíhàn náà gẹ́gẹ́ bi “ ìtàgé rédíò ohun àtíjò pèlú àyípadà titun àti ìtìjú tó kù dìé kááto.”

translation.en: In its early days, the show was featured solely at the long-running internet radio site TogiNet Radio, a site focused on talk radio.
translation.yo: Lówùrọ́ọ̀ ọjọ́ ayé rẹ̀, ètò náà sàfihàn ìlò ìtàkùn rádíò TogiNet Radio, ìtàkùn tó fojúsun ọ̀rọ̀ orí rádíò.

translation.en: In late 2015, TogiNet established AstroNet Radio as a subsidiary station.
translation.yo: Ní ìparí 2015, Togineti dá Rédíò Astroneti sílẹ̀ gẹ́gẹ́ bí àyè rédíò àbẹ́.

translation.en: The show originally featured amateur voice actors, local to East Texas.
translation.yo: Ni atileba ere naa lo awon elere ohun to n kose, to wa ni agbegbe Tegsasi Ila Oru.

translation.en: Widespread looting reportedly continued overnight, as law enforcement officers were not present on Bishkek's streets.
translation.yo: Wọ́n ròyìn pé olè jíjà tó gbàlú tún ń kiri ní gbogbo òru tòrípé àwọn agbófinró ò sí ní títì Bishkek.

translation.en: Bishkek was described as sinking into a state of "anarchy" by one observer, as gangs of people roamed the streets and plundered stores of consumer goods.
translation.yo: Wọn ṣàpèjúwé Bishkek gẹ́gẹ́ bí èyí tó ti wọ inú ipò tí “gbogbo rẹ́ ti dàrú nígbàtí kò sí olórí” nípa olùwòran kan, gẹ́gẹ́ bí ọ̀pọ̀ ènìyàn tí rìn káàkiri ojú títì tí wọ́n sí jí àwọn ọjà àwọn ènìyàn.

translation.en: Several Bishkek residents blamed protesters from the south for the lawlessness.
translation.yo: Ọpọlọpọ awọn olugbe Bishkek gbe ẹbin ainibowo fun ofin ru awọn olufehonuhan lati apa iha guusu.

translation.en: South Africa have defeated the All Blacks (New Zealand) in a rugby union Tri Nations match at the Royal Bafokeng Stadium in Rustenburg, South Africa.
translation.yo: Ilẹ̀ South Africa ti sẹ́gun àwọn aláwọ̀ dúdú gbogbo (New Zealand) nínú ẹgbẹ́ rugby orílẹ̀ mẹ́ta ní pápá ìseré Royal Bafokeng nílẹ̀ Rustenburg nilẹ̀ South Africa.

translation.en: The final score was a one-point victory, 21 to 20, ending the All Blacks' 15 game winning streak.
translation.yo: Esi asekagba je ti ibori pelu ayo kan don do, mokanlelogun si ogun, to o fi opin si aifi-idiremi meedogun lera-lera ti All Blacks’.

translation.en: For the Springboks, it ended a five-match losing streak.
translation.yo: Fun awon Springbooki, o so ipadanu ere-marun seyin dopin.

translation.en: It was the final match for the All Blacks, who had already won the trophy two weeks ago.
translation.yo: Ere ti wọn gbẹyin gba ni fun awọn All Black to ti gbegba oroke ni ọsẹ meji to kọja.

translation.en: The final match of the series will take place at Ellis Park in Johannesburg next week, when the Springboks play Australia.
translation.yo: ifesewonse asekagba eto yio waye ni Papa isere Ellis ni Ilu johannesburg ni ose tin b, nigba ti Springboks gba pelu Australi.

translation.en: A moderate earthquake shook western Montana at 10:08 p.m. on Monday.
translation.yo: Iji to le die mi apa iwo orun Montana ni ago 10:08 aaro lojo Aje.

translation.en: No immediate reports of damage have been received by the United States Geological Survey (USGS) and its National Earthquake Information Center.
translation.yo: Kò sí ìjàbọ̀ ìjàmbá lẹsẹ̀kẹsẹ̀ ́nípasẹ̀ United States Geological Survey (USGS) àti Ibùdó National Earthquake.

translation.en: The earthquake was centered about 20 km (15 miles) north-northeast of Dillon, and about 65 km (40 miles) south of Butte.
translation.yo: Isele ile riri naa kojopo si bii km ogun (maili meedogun) ni apa ariwa-ariwa ila oorun Dilioni ati bi km marundinlogorin (maili ogoji) guusu Butte.

translation.en: The strain of bird flu lethal to humans, H5N1, has been confirmed to have infected a dead wild duck, found on Monday, in marshland near Lyon in the east of France.
translation.yo: Wàhálà bird flu sí àwa ènìyàn, H5N1, ti gba àrídájú pé o ti koran pẹ́pẹ́yẹ, tí wọ́n rí ní ọjọ́ ajé, ní marshland ní tò sí Lyon ní ìlà òòrùn France.

translation.en: France is the seventh country in the European Union to suffer this virus; following Austria, Germany, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Greece and Italy.
translation.yo: Ilẹ̀ Faransé ní orílèèdè èkeje nínú àjọ ìsọ̀kan ilẹ̀ Europu tí yíò farakásá kòkòrò yìí lẹ́yìn ilẹ̀ Austria, Germany, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Greece àti Italy.

translation.en: Suspected cases of H5N1 in Croatia and Denmark remain unconfirmed.
translation.yo: Wọn kò sií ì sàfimúnlẹ̀ ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ afurasí H5N1 ní Croatia àti Denmark.

translation.en: Chambers had sued God for "widespread death, destruction and terrorization of millions upon millions of the Earth's inhabitants."
translation.yo: Chambers ti pé Ọlọ́run lẹ́jọ̀ fún “àjàkálẹ̀ ikú, ìparun àti ìfúngun mọ́ ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ àwọn èèyàn tó wà nínú ay.”

translation.en: Chambers, an agnostic, argues that his lawsuit is "frivolous" and "anybody can sue anybody."
translation.yo: Chambers tó jẹ́ onígberaga jiyàn pé ẹ̀sùn òhun kò lẹ́sẹ̀ ńlẹ̀ àti pé ẹnikẹ́ni lè gbé ẹni tó bá wùú relé ẹjọ́.

translation.en: The story presented in the French opera, by Camille Saint-Saens, is of an artist "whose life is dictated by a love for drugs and Japan."
translation.yo: Ìtàn tí Casmille Saint--Saens ṣàgbékalè rẹ nínú eré ìtàgé Faransé, jẹ tí ayé rè kún fún ìfẹ́ àwọn ògùn àti Japan .

translation.en: As a result, the performers smoke cannabis joints on stage, and the theatre itself is encouraging the audience to join in.
translation.yo: Fún ìdí èyí, àwọn òṣèré ń mu tábà líle lórí eré ìtàgé áti pe eré ìtàgé tìkalárarẹ̀ ń gba àwọn olùwòran ní ìmòràn láti se bẹ́ẹ̀ gẹ́gẹ́.

translation.en: Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, Texas governor Rick Perry, and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann finished in fourth, fifth, and sixth place, respectively.
translation.yo: Agbẹnusọ ti Newt Gingrich tẹ́lẹ̀, Gómìnà Texas Rich Perry àti ọmọ ẹgbẹ́ ìjọba lóbìnrin Michele Bachmann parí ipò hẹrin, ìkarùn, àti ìkẹfà.

translation.en: After the results came in, Gingrich lauded Santorum, but had tough words for Romney, on whose behalf negative campaign advertisements were aired in Iowa against Gingrich.
translation.yo: Lẹ́yìn tí àbájáde wolé, Girinigiṣi sa Santorumu ṣùgbọ́n ìbáwí ló ní fún Romini, tí wọ́n torí ti ẹ ṣe Ìpolówó burúkú fún Gingiriṣi ní ìpínlẹ̀ Iowa.

translation.en: Perry stated that he would "return to Texas to assess the results of tonight's caucus, determine whether there is a path forward for myself in this race", but later said that he would remain in the race and compete in the January 21 South Carolina primary.
translation.yo: Perry ṣe àlàyé wípé òhun o ‘padà sí Texas láti ṣe ayèwò àbájáde ifikùnlukùn ẹgbẹ́ lálé òní, pinnu bóyá ìtẹ̀síwájù wà fún mi nínú ìdíje yìí.” Ṣùgbọ́n lẹ́yìn náà o sọ wípé òhun o tesíwájú nínú ìdíje láti figagbága nínú idibò abẹ́lẹ́ ọjọ́ kọkànlélógún oṣù kìíní tí gúúsù Carolina.

translation.en: Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to end her campaign.
translation.yo: Bachmann, tó borí ìdìbò Ames Straw nínú oọù kẹjọ ti pinnu láti parí ìpolongo rẹ̀.

translation.en: The photographer was transported to Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, where he subsequently died.
translation.yo: Wọ́n ti gbé ayàwòrán lọ sí ilé ìtọ́jú UCLA Ronald Reagan, níbi tí ó ti padà jáde láyé.

translation.en: He was reportedly aged in his 20s. In a statement, Bieber said "[w]hile I was not present nor directly involved with this tragic accident, my thoughts and prayers are with the family of the victim."
translation.yo: Wọ́n fi tó ni léti pé o kú ni nǹkan bí ọmọ ogún ọdún, Birber sọ pé “ mi ò sí ní ibẹ̀ bẹ́ẹ̀ ni ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ ńla-ibi yìí kò ṣe ojú mi kòró, àdúrà mi ńbẹ pẹ̀lú àwọn ẹbí tí olóògbé fi sí ayé.

translation.en: Entertainment news website TMZ understands the photographer stopped his vehicle on the other side of Sepulveda Boulevard and attempted to take pictures of the police stop before crossing the road and continuing, prompting the California Highway Patrol police officer conducting the traffic stop to order him back across, twice.
translation.yo: Ìtàkùn Ìròyìn ìdárayá tí a mọ̀ sí TMZ jẹ́ kó yé pé àayàwòrán náà dá ọkọ̀ òun dúró lẹ́gbẹ̀ẹ́ kejì Sepulveda Boulevard, ó sì gbìyànjú láti ya àwòránibi ìdánidúró àwọn ọlọ́pàá kí ó tó sọdá sí òdì kejì tí ó sì tẹ̀síwájú, ní èyí tí ó mú kí àwọn ọlọ́pàá òpópónà California tí wọn n ṣe ètò sún kẹrẹ̀ fà kẹrẹ ọkọ dáa dúró kí o padà ní ẹ̀ẹ̀méj.

translation.en: According to police, the driver of the vehicle that hit the photographer is unlikely to face criminal charges.
translation.yo: Pelu ohun ti awon agbofinro so, o sese ki awako oko to kolu ayaworan naa ma fi oju bale ejo.

translation.en: With only eighteen medals available a day, a number of countries have failed to make the medal podium.
translation.yo: Pẹ̀lú gbigba àwọn àmì ẹ̀yẹ méjìdínlógún lójojúmọ́, ọ̀pọ̀ àwọn orílẹ̀-èdè ti kùnà láti wà lóri tábìlì àmì ẹ̀yẹ.

translation.en: They include the Netherlands, with Anna Jochemsen finishing ninth in the women's standing class in the Super-G yesterday, and Finland with Katja Saarinen finishing tenth in the same event.
translation.yo: Wọ́n sàfimọ́ àwọn ará ilẹ̀ Netherlands pẹ̀lú Anna Jochemsen tó parí pẹ̀lú ipò kẹsàn án nínú àwọn obìnrin tó ń dúró ní kílàsì super-G lánàá àti Katja Saarinen ti ìlú Finland tó parí pẹ̀lú ipò kẹwàá nínú ètò kanáà.

translation.en: Australia's Mitchell Gourley finished eleventh in the men's standing Super-G. Czech competitor Oldrich Jelinek finished sixteenth in the men's sitting Super-G.
translation.yo: Mitchell Gourley ti ilẹ̀ Australia parí pẹ̀lú ipò kọkànlá nínú àwọn ọkùnrin tó wà nínú ìdíje Super-G. Czech tí Oldrich Jelinek sì parí pẹ̀lú ipò kẹrìndínlógún ìdíje super-G.

translation.en: Arly Velasquez of Mexico finished fifteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. New Zealand's Adam Hall finished ninth in the men's standing Super-G.
translation.yo: Arly Velasquez ti ilẹ̀ Mexico parí nípò karùndínlógún ìjókòó àwọn ọkùnrin Super-G. Adam Hall ti ilẹ̀ New Zealand parí pẹ̀lú ipò kẹsàn án níjòòkó àwọn ọkùnrin Super-G.

translation.en: Poland's men's visually impaired skier Maciej Krezel and guide Anna Ogarzynska finished thirteenth in the Super-G. South Korea's Jong Seork Park finished twenty-fourth in the men's sitting Super-G.
translation.yo: Ọkùnrin afọ́jú a gùnkè ilẹ̀ Poland Maciej Krezel àti guide Anna Ogarzynska parí pẹ̀lú ipò kẹtàlá nínú ìdíje Super-G. Jong Seork Park ti ilẹ̀ South Korea parí pẹ̀lú ipò mẹ́rìnlélógún nígun àwọn ọkùnrin super-G.

translation.en: UN peacekeepers, whom arrived in Haiti after the 2010 earthquake, are being blamed for the spread of the disease which started near the troop's encampment.
translation.yo: Àwọn asètò àlááfíà àjọ UN, tí wọ́n dé ìlú Haiti lẹ́yìn ìsẹ̀lẹ̀ ìjì líle ní ọdún 2010, ni wọ́n ti dá lẹ́bi fún títan ààrùn tó bẹ̀rẹ̀ ní etí bèbè àgọ́ àwọn ọmọ ológun ká.

translation.en: According to the lawsuit, waste from the UN camp was not properly sanitized, causing bacteria to enter the tributary of the Artibonite River, one of Haiti's largest.
translation.yo: Gẹ́gẹ́ bí ìwé ìpéjọ́, ìdọ̀tí tí àjọ UN kó jáde ní ọ̀nà tí kó boójú mú fún ìlera, ṣe okùnfà àwọn kòkòrò àrùn tó wọ ibùdó odò Artbonite, ìkan lára èyí tó tóbi jù ní Haiti .

translation.en: Prior to the arrival of troops, Haiti had not encountered problems related to the disease since the 1800s.
translation.yo: Kí àwọn ológun tó dé, ìlú Haiti kò ì tí kojú ìsòro tí ó jọ́ mọ́ ààrùn yìí láti ọdun 1800.

translation.en: The Haitian Institute for Justice and Democracy has referenced independent studies that suggest the Nepalese UN peacekeeping battalion unknowingly brought the disease to Haiti.
translation.yo: Ilẹ́-ẹ̀kọ́ fún òdodo àti ìjọba tiwantiwan ti Haiti ti tọ́ka sí àwọn ìwádìí olómìnira tí ó dá àbá pẹ́ ikọ́ ọmọ ogun ti Nepal fún àlàáfíà ní UN pẹ̀lú àìmọ̀ kó àrùn náà wọ Haiti.

translation.en: Danielle Lantagne, a UN expert on the disease, stated the outbreak was likely caused by the peacekeepers.
translation.yo: Danielle Lantagne, tí oh jẹ́ ògbóntarìgì fún UN lórí àìsàn, sọ pé àwọn onílàjà ni ó ṣe e ṣe kí wọn fa àjàkálẹ̀ ná.

translation.en: Hamilton confirmed Howard University Hospital admitted the patient in stable condition.
translation.yo: Hamilton fi idi re mule wipe ile iwosan ile eko giga Howard gba alaisan na wole ni ara pipe.

translation.en: The patient had been to Nigeria, where some cases of the Ebola virus have occurred.
translation.yo: Aláìsàn náà ti lọ sí ilẹ̀ Nigeria níbiti wọ́n ti ní àwọn ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ kòkòrò Èbólà kan ti wáyé.

translation.en: The hospital has followed protocol for infection control, including separating the patient from others to prevent possible infection of others.
translation.yo: Ile iwosan naa ti tẹle gbogbo ilana lati dena kokoro, wọn ya awọn ti wọn ni kokoro kuro lati ma ba ko ran awọn to ṣẹku.

translation.en: Before The Simpsons Simon had worked on several shows in various positions.
translation.yo: Látẹ̀yìnwá, Simpsons Simon ti sisẹ́ lórí ọ́pọ́lọpọ́ àwọn àfihàn ní onírúurú ipò.

translation.en: During the 1980s he worked on shows such as Taxi, Cheers, and The Tracy Ullman Show.
translation.yo: Ni odun 1980s o kópa ninu awon ere bii Taxi, Cheers ati Ere Traci Ulman.

translation.en: In 1989 he helped create The Simpsons with Brooks and Groening, and was responsible for hiring the show's first writing team.
translation.yo: Ní 1989 ó rànwọ́lọ́wọ́ láti ṣe ìdásílẹ̀ The Simpson with Brooks àti Groening, ló jk aṣojú fún gbígba àwọn ẹgbẹ́ àkọ́kọ́ tó ko ètò náà.

translation.en: Despite leaving the show in 1993 he kept the title of executive producer, and continued to receive tens of millions of dollars every season in royalties.
translation.yo: Pẹ̀lú pé ó kúrò nínú eré náà ni ọdún 1993 orúkọ rẹ̀ sí wà gẹ́gẹ́ bí onígbọ̀wọ́ àgbà, ó sìn ń gba mílíọ̀nù mẹ́wàá dọ́là ní sáà gbogbo nínú ọlạ́.

translation.en: Earlier the Chinese news agency Xinhua reported a plane to be hijacked.
translation.yo: Sáájú, ilé-iṣẹ́ oníròyìn ilẹ̀ China, Xinhua jábọ̀ ọkọ̀ òfuurufú tí a fẹ́ fi ipá gbà.

translation.en: Later reports then stated the plane received a bomb threat and was diverted back to Afghanistan, landing in Kandahar.
translation.yo: Awon iroyin to gbeyin nigba naa wipe oko oju ofurufu naa gba ihale bombu won de daa pada lo si Afganistani, o de si Kandaha.

translation.en: The early reports say the plane was diverted back to Afghanistan after being denied an emergency landing in Ürümqi.
translation.yo: Ìròyìn àárọ̀ ní wọ́n dá ọkọ̀ ojú òfúrufú lọ sí Afghanistan lẹ́yìn tí wọ́n dùn wọ́n ní ìbalẹ̀ pàjáwìrì ní Ürümqi.

translation.en: Air accidents are common in Iran, which has an aging fleet that is poorly maintained both for civil and military operations.
translation.yo: Ìjàm̀bá ojú òfúrufú ló wọ́pọ̀ ní ilẹ̀ Iran, èyí tó ní ìtàn pípẹ́ fún àìse àbòjútó tó péye fún ìlò ará ìlú àti ológun.

translation.en: International sanctions have meant that new aircraft cannot be purchased.
translation.yo: Òfin ìfìyàjẹni ilẹ̀ òkèrè ti fi lélẹ̀ pẹ kò gbọdọ̀ sí ríra ọkọ̀ ojú òfurufú tuntun.

translation.en: Earlier this week, a police helicopter crash killed three people and wounded three more.
translation.yo: Níbẹ̀rẹ̀ ọsẹ̀ yìí, ọkọ̀ bàálù abàsíbi ó wùú àwọn ọlọ́pàá sekúpa èèyàn mẹ́ta , nígbàtí àwọn mẹ́tàa min farapa .

translation.en: Last month Iran saw its worst air disaster in years when an airliner heading to Armenia crashed, killing the 168 on board.
translation.yo: Lóṣù tó kọjá, ilẹ̀ Iran fojú winná àjálù ojú afẹ́fẹ́ tó burú jù lọ́dún nígbàtí ọkọ̀ ojú òfúrufú tó ń lọ sí ilẹ̀ Armenia já lulẹ̀, èyí tó sekúpa ènìyàn méjìdínláàdọ́sàn án tó wà nínú rẹ̀.

translation.en: The same month saw another airliner overrun a runway at Mashhad and strike a wall, killing seventeen.
translation.yo: Ni osu kan naa oko ofurufu miin sa koja oju ona ni Masaadi o de kolu ogiri, awon eyan metadinlogun lo ku.

translation.en: Aerosmith have cancelled their remaining concerts on their tour.
translation.yo: Aerosmith ti fagilé ìpàdé orin tó kù ní ìrìn àjò.

translation.en: The rock band was due to tour the United States and Canada until September 16.
translation.yo: Ẹgbé olórin alàriwo ohùn ti jìtá náà tí sétó làti rin Orílẹ̀-èdè Améríkà àti Canada já títí di Ọjọ́ Kẹrìndínlógún Osù Kẹsàn.

translation.en: They have cancelled the tour after lead singer Steven Tyler was injured after he fell off stage while performing on August 5.
translation.yo: Wọ́n ti wọ́gilé ìrìnafẹ́ lẹ́yìn tí asájú orin Steven Tyler nífarapa lẹ́yin tó subú lórí ìtàgé lákòókò tó ń seré lọ́jọ́ karùn ún osù kẹjọ.

translation.en: Murray lost the first set in a tie break after both men held each and every serve in the set.
translation.yo: Mure pàdánù eré kiní ní eré ìdíje titiipa lẹ́yìn tí àwọn okùnrin náà di gbogbo sefi ní sẹ́ti náà.

translation.en: Del Potro had the early advantage in the second set, but this too required a tie break after reaching 6-6.
translation.yo: Del Potro ní àfàní láti ìbẹ̀rẹ̀ ní ìpín kẹjì, sùgbọn èyí náà pèfún yíyanjú ìfagagbága lẹ̀yín ayo mẹ́fà si mẹ́fà.

translation.en: Potro received treatment to his shoulder at this point but managed to return to the game.
translation.yo: Potro gba itoju si ejika re nibayi o si gbiyanju lati pada si ori papa.

translation.en: The program started at 8:30 p.m. local time (15.00 UTC).
translation.yo: Eto naa bere ni dede ago mejo abo ale ti ile naa (15.00 UTC).

translation.en: Famous singers across the country presented bhajans, or devotional songs, to Shri Shyam's feet.
translation.yo: Awon ogbontarigi olorin kakiri orileede sagbekale bhajans abi orin isin si abe ese Shyam.

translation.en: Singer Sanju Sharma started the evening, followed by Jai Shankar Choudhary. esented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him.
translation.yo: Akọrin Sanju Ṣama ló bẹ̀rẹ̀ etò ìrọ̀lẹ́, Jai Ṣanka Ṣudiri ló tẹ́lẹ̀ Jai Sanaka Sandiri naa. Akọrin Raju Kandiwali n kọri tẹ́lẹ̀.

translation.en: Then, Lakkha Singh took the lead in singing the bhajans.
translation.yo: Lẹ́yìn náà, Lakkha Singh ni ó gba ìdarí kíkọ orin bhajans.

translation.en: 108 plates of Chhappan Bhog (in Hinduism, 56 different edible items, like, sweets, fruits, nuts, dishes etc. which are offered to deity) were served to Baba Shyam.
translation.yo: Àwọn Chhappan Bhog méjìdínláàdọ́fà (ni Hinduism, mẹ́rìndílọ́gọ́ta ọ̀tọ̀tọ̀ ohun tó ṣe é jẹ, bíi súùtì èso, ẹ̀pà, ounjẹ abbl. Tí wọ́n gbé fún àwọn òrìṣà) ni wọ́n gbé fún Baba Shyam.

translation.en: Lakkha Singh presented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him.
translation.yo: Lakkha Singh ti se ìfàkalẹ̀ chhappan bhog bhajan pẹ̀lú. Olórin Raju Khandelwal ló ń kọ́ọ̀wọ́rìn pẹ̀lú rẹ̀.

translation.en: At Thursday's keynote presentation of the Tokyo Game Show, Nintendo president Satoru Iwata unveiled the controller design for the company's new Nintendo Revolution console.
translation.yo: Nínú àgbékalẹ̀ gbòógì àfihàn géèmù ilẹ̀ Tokyo tọjọ́ àlàmísì, ààrẹ ilẹ̀ Nintendo, Satoru Iwata se àfihàn ìsàkóso àwòrán fún iléẹṣẹ́ tuntun Nintendo Revolution.

translation.en: Resembling a television remote, the controller uses two sensors placed near the user's television to triangulate its position in three-dimensional space.
translation.yo: Ó jọ ohun ìdarí ẹ̀rọ amóhùnmáwòrán, ohun tí ẹ ó fi tukọ̀ lo sẹ́ńsọ̀ méjì tí wọ́n gbé sí ẹ̀gbẹ́tẹ̀ifisàn ẹni tí ó ń lòó láti yígun ipo rẹ̀ ni ọnà mẹ́ta ọ̀tọ̀ọ̀tọ̀.

translation.en: This will allow players to control actions and movements in video games by moving the device through the air.
translation.yo: Èyí máa gba àwọn eléré ìje láàyè láti darí àwọn ìrìnkákiri nínú eré fídíò nípa gbígbé èrọ náà ká nípasẹ̀ afẹ́fẹ. .

translation.en: Giancarlo Fisichella lost control of his car and ended the race very soon after the start.
translation.yo: Jiankalo Fisisela o lè ṣàkóso moto mọ́,ó dẹ̀ mú u kí èrè sísá náà parí lẹ́sẹ̀kẹsẹ̀ tí wọ́n bẹ̀rẹ̀.

translation.en: His teammate Fernando Alonso was in the lead for most of the race, but ended it right after his pit-stop, probably because a badly tucked right front wheel.
translation.yo: Ọmọ egbẹ́ rẹ̀ Fenando Alonso ló darí fún púpọ̀ nínú ere ìdíjé, ṣùgbọ́n ó parí lẹ́yìn ìdádúro re, bóyá nítorí pé wọn ò fí ojúẹsẹ̀ṣ mọ́tò há dada.

translation.en: Michael Schumacher ended his race not long after Alonso, because of the suspension damage in the numerous battles during the race.
translation.yo: Michael Schumacher parí eréje rẹ̀ láìpẹ́ tí Alonso parí nítori ìjàm̀bá ìrọ́kúnlé nínú ọ̀pọ̀ ìjà làkòókò eréje.

translation.en: "She’s very cute and sings quite well, too," he said according to a transcript of the news conference.
translation.yo: “Ó lẹ́wà lọ́pọ́, ó tún kọrin dáradára,” ó sọ́ nípa àkọọ́lẹ̀ ìpàdé àwọn oníròyìn.

translation.en: "I was moved every time we did a rehearsal on this, from the bottom of my heart."
translation.yo: “Gbogbo ìgbà tí a bá se ìgbáradì lóri rẹ̀ ni ara mi ma ń dìde látinú ọkàn mi wá.”

translation.en: Around 3 minutes into the launch, an on-board camera showed numerous pieces of insulation foam break away from the fuel tank.
translation.yo: Nígbàtí yíò fi tó ìṣẹ́jú mẹ́ta ìsàfilọ́lẹ̀, ọ̀kan lára èrò ayàwòrán tó wà nínú ọkọ̀ ti sàfihàn ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ ẹyọ fóòmù ìdáàbòòbò tó já kúrò lára ilé ìképosí.

translation.en: However, they are not thought to have caused any damage to the shuttle.
translation.yo: Síbẹ̀síbẹ̀, kò sí ẹ̀ròngbà wípé wọn mú ìdibàjẹ́ bá agbẹ́rù náà.

translation.en: NASA's shuttle program chief N. Wayne Hale Jr. said the foam had fallen "after the time we are concerned about."
translation.yo: Aládarí ọkọ̀ alálọbọ̀ ti NASA, N.Wayne Hale Jr. sọ ọ́ di mímọ̀ pé fóòmùn ti jábọ́ “lẹ́yìn ìgbà tí ó se kókó fún wa”.

translation.en: Five minutes into the display a wind starts rolling in, about a minute later, the wind is reaching 70km/h... then the rain comes, but so hard and so large that it slaps your skin like a needle, then hail fell from the sky, people panicking and screaming and running over each other.
translation.yo: Ìṣẹ́jú márùn ún síwájú idán, ìjì bẹ̀rẹ̀ sí ni jà, bí ìṣẹ́jú kan si, ìjì náà dé orí àádọ́rin kìlómítà láàrín wákàtí kan…léyìn náà ni òjò bẹ̀rẹ̀ sí ni rọ̀ to bẹ́ẹ̀ ti dídún rẹ̀ lára dàbí abẹ́rẹ́, bẹ́ẹ̀ ni yìnyín ń bọ́ láti ojú ọ̀run, gbogbo ẹnìyàn bẹ̀rẹ̀ sí ní wá rìrì, wọ́n ń bẹ̀rù, wọ́n ń pariwo, wọ́n sì ń sá gba orí ara wọn.

translation.en: I lost my sister and her friend, and on my way there were two disabled people in wheelchairs, people just jumping over and pushing them," Armand Versace said.
translation.yo: Mo pàdánù àbúrò mi obìnrin àti ọ̀rẹ́ rẹ̀, ní ojú ọ̀nà nígbàtí mò ń lọ mo rí àwọn aláàbbọ̀ ara méjì lórí àga, àwọn ènìyàn kàn ti ara wọ́n,” Armand Versace sọ bẹ́ẹ̀.

translation.en: NHK also reported that the Kashiwazaki Kariwa nuclear power plant in Niigata prefecture was operating normally.
translation.yo: NHK ròyìn pe Ilé ìgbìn agbára nukilia Kaṣiwasaki Kariwa ni Nigata kí ń ṣiṣẹ́ dédé tẹ̀lé.

translation.en: Hokuriku Electric Power Co. reported no effects from the earthquake and that the Number 1 and 2 reactors at its Shika nuclear power plant were shut down.
translation.yo: Hokuriku electric power co. jábọ̀ pé kò sí ipa kankan látara ilẹ̀ rírì àti pé àwọn ìsesí kìnní àti ìkejì sí ilé iṣẹ̀ tó ń pèsè agbára apanirun Shika ni wọ́n ti gbé tìpa.

translation.en: It is reported that some 9400 homes in the region are without water and approximately 100 without electricity.
translation.yo: A gba pé àwọm ilé tó tó 9400 ní agbègbè náà wà láìsí omo àti pé àwọn tó tó 100 wà láìsí iná.

translation.en: Some roads have been damaged, railway service interrupted in the affected areas, and the Noto Airport in Ishikawa prefecture remains closed.
translation.yo: Àwọn ọ̀nà kán ti bàjẹ́ wón to dá reluwé dúró níbi tó kàn Papa Ọkọ̀ Ofurufu Noto ní Iṣikawa wà ní títì.

translation.en: One bomb exploded outside the governor general's office.
translation.yo: Àdó olóró kan dún gbàmù ní ọfíìsi ̀gbogbogbo gómìnà.

translation.en: Three more bombs exploded near government buildings in a period of two hours.
translation.yo: Boomu mẹ́ta bẹ̀ ní ẹ̀gbẹ́ ilé ìjọba laarin wákàtí méjì.

translation.en: Some reports put the official death toll at eight, and official reports confirm that up to 30 were injured; but final numbers are not yet known.
translation.yo: Awon iroyin miin wipe bii eyan mejo lo ku, iroyin osise jeri pe o to 30 to sise; sugbon a o tii mo awon onka ipari.

translation.en: Both cyanuric acid and melamine were found in urine samples from pets that died after consuming contaminated pet food.
translation.yo: Cyanuric àti melamine ni a rí nínu ìtọ̀ àwọn ohun ọ̀sìn inu ilé tó ti kú lẹ́yìn tí wọ́n jẹ òúnjẹ́ wọ́n tó ti dọ̀tí.

translation.en: The two compounds react with one another to form crystals that may block kidney function, researchers at the university said.
translation.yo: Àwọn ìsopọ̀ méjì náà siṣẹ́pọ̀ pẹ̀lú ara wọn láti di àwọn kìrísítà tí ó lè dí iṣẹ́ kídìnrín lọ́wọ́ gẹ́gẹ́ bí àwọn olùsàyẹ̀wò ilẹ́ẹ̀kọ́ fásitì ti wí.

translation.en: The researchers observed crystals formed in cat urine by the addition of melamine and cyanuric acid.
translation.yo: Àwọn oníiwàdí ri wíp wọ́n se kírísítà pẹ̀lú ìtọo olóńgbò pẹ̀lú àdàlù melamine àticyanuric acid.

translation.en: The composition of these crystals matches those found in the urine of affected pets when compared by infrared spectroscopy (FTIR).
translation.yo: Ẹ̀kún àwọn kristali wọ̀nyí bá ti ìtọ̀ àwọn ẹran ọ̀sìn to kóo nígbàtí a fi wọn wéra pẹ̀lú infrared spectroscopy (FTIR.

translation.en: I don't know if you realize it or not, but most of the goods from Central America came into this country duty-free.
translation.yo: Mi kò mọ̀ bóyá ó yé ọ tàbí kò yé ọ, sùgbọ́n ọ̀pọ̀ àwọn ẹrù ni ó dé láti ààrin gbùngbùn America wọ orílèèdè yìí lọ́ọ̀fẹ́.

translation.en: Yet eighty percent of our goods were taxed through tariffs in Central American countries. we treat you.
translation.yo: Bee kede re, mejo ninu idamewa awon oja wa ni o gba owo ori nipase tarifi ni ilu Amerika aarin, aa wo e san.

translation.en: That didn't seem to make sense to me; it certainly wasn't fair.
translation.yo: Ìyẹn ò ní ìtunmọ̀ sí mi; dájúdájú kò dára.

translation.en: All I say to people is you treat us the way we treat you.
translation.yo: Ohun gbogbo tí mo má ń sọ fáwọn ènìyàn ni wípé kí o tọ́jú wa bí a se ń tọ́jú rẹ.

translation.en: California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger signed into law a bill that bans the sale or rental of violent video games to minors.
translation.yo: Gomina Kalifonia Arnold Schwarzenegger fowosi ofin titun ti o pa leewo lati ya tabi ta ere fidio to ni ijakadi, si awon omo kekere..

translation.en: The bill requires violent video games sold in the state of California to be labeled with a decal reading "18" and makes their sale to a minor punishable by a fine of $1000 per offense.
translation.yo: Àbá náà gba kí wọ́n sa àmì “ọmọ ọdún méjìdínlógún” sí ara eré fọ́ńrán amóhùnmáwòrán ̀ kan tí wọ́n tà ní ìpínlẹ̀ California, kí wọ́n sì ta ọjà wọn fún àwọn ọmọ tí wọn kò ì bàlágà ṣùgbọ́n tí ìjìyà owó ìtanràn tó tó ẹgbẹ̀rún kan dọ́là wà fún.

translation.en: The Director of Public Prosecutions, Kier Starmer QC, gave a statement this morning announcing the prosecution of both Huhne and Pryce.
translation.yo: Àwọn adarí ìbánirojó Gbogbgbò, Kier Stammer QC, fi ọ̀rọ̀ kan sílẹ̀ ní àárs yìí tí ó ń kéde ìbánirojọ́ ti Huhne àti Pryce.

translation.en: Huhne has resigned and he will be replaced in the Cabinet by Ed Davey MP. Norman Lamb MP is expected to take the Business Minister job Davey is vacating.
translation.yo: Hune ti fiwe sile, won de ma fi Ed Dafe MP ropo e ni Igbimo. Nomani Lab MP ni a n reti pe o ma gba ise Minista Isowo ti Dafe ma fi sile.

translation.en: Huhne and Pryce are scheduled to appear at the Westminster Magistrates Court on February 16.
translation.yo: A ṣètò fún Huhne àti Pryce láti farahàn níwájú ilé ẹjọ́ májísírètì Westminster ní ọjọ́o kẹrìndínlógún oṣùu kejì.

translation.en: The fatalities were Nicholas Alden, 25, and Zachary Cuddeback, 21. Cuddeback had been the driver.
translation.yo: Àwọn tí ó kú ní Nikolasi Aldini, márùndínlọ́gbọ̀n, àti Sakari Kudbaaki, mọ́kànlélógún, Kudbaaki ni ó ń wa ọkọ̀.

translation.en: Edgar Veguilla received arm and jaw wounds while Kristoffer Schneider was left requiring reconstructive surgery for his face.
translation.yo: Edgar Veguilla gba ọgbẹ́ ní apá ati àgbọ̀ǹ nígbà tí Kristoffer Scheider wà ní ipò tó nílò àtúnsẹ isé abẹ fún ojú rè.

translation.en: Uka's weapon failed whilst pointed at a fifth man's head. Schneider has ongoing pain, blindness in one eye, a missing section of skull and a face rebuilt from titanium.
translation.yo: Irinogun Uka rugbá nígbàtí wọ́n kọjú ẹ̀ sórí okùnrin ikarun. Ṣinaida wà nínú ìnira lọ́wọ́, ojú rẹ̀ kan ti fọ́, apá agbári rẹ̀ ti sọnù ati pé apá ojú rẹ̀ kan kikida titaniumu ni wọn fi tún un kọ́.

translation.en: Schneider testified via videolink from a USAF base in his homeland.
translation.yo: Ṣínaida fi ìhá-fídíò jẹ́rí láti ibi ọ̀dọ̀ USAF kan nínú orílèdé rẹ̀.

translation.en: Beyond Wednesday's event, Carpanedo competed in two individual races at the Championships.
translation.yo: Kọjá ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ ọjọ́rú, Carpanedo kópa nínú ìdíje orísìí méjì níbi ìfigagbága olúbori.

translation.en: Her first was the Slalom, where she earned a Did Not Finish in her first run. 36 of the 116 competitors had the same result in that race.
